analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/20/0x2fce7053210909db9764d6b3118f23659cfd36bc.sol:
	Contract StarambaToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/20/0x2fce7053210909db9764d6b3118f23659cfd36bc.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/20/0x2fce7053210909db9764d6b3118f23659cfd36bc.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
